column2: order at the counter cafeteria style
column3: they have bottled beer and a few drafts
column4: Mac and cheese and beans looks like their main sides;x I didn't come for the sides though
column7: and a few other things.  The place is plenty big; I'd guess room for 100 to sit and eat
column8: and the parking was easy both times I've been.  All the BBQ has a great crust
column9: think salt and pepper and not sweet; just the way I like it.
